channel.title: Glock 17 reloading sound failed
channel.description:
Hey,
I have found a bug of the Glock 17. Every time I reloaded it in a ventilation shaft, the sound did not appear (that klicking of the magazine and stuff).
I know it's only a little bug, but I wanted to report it. :slight_smile:
brot
